cont.entity_a: Provides bass control for Bose Cinemate. Volume control does not work for audio processing. Remote does not adjust volume. Remote control lacks unit controls. User-friendly improvements needed for remote control buttons.

cont.entity_b: Runs on USB power and is driverless. Does not work with older USB ports. No driver CD needed, plug-and-play. Issues with compatibility with Windows 7. Driver-less installation on Mac OSX 10.6.

cont.entity_a: Inexpensive alternative to true surround sound. Compact and inexpensive for stereo amplifier use.

Improves sound clarity and bass. Dialogue in surround sound movies is clearer. Enhances sound for small 2.1 stereo systems. Improves sound quality for gaming headsets. Significantly improves sound of small library sound systems. Offers sound improvement worth the cost.
cont.entity_b: Improves sound quality for music and movies. Removes majority of white noise. Offers improvement over built-in sound cards. X-Fi Crystalizer and CMSS-3D features enhance sound. Improves sound quality of streaming internet radio. Enhances highs and lows of digital recordings. Simple amplifier that improves sound quality. Difficult to install and configure but produces good sound.

cont.entity_a: Not as spatial as expected for full surround sound. Surround mode boosts loudness but lacks differentiation.
cont.entity_b: Creates realistic sounds with 3D surround sound option.
Produces buzzing noise on Ubuntu Linux. Mutes sound after computer sleep mode. Improves laptop sound quality but has noise with sensitive earphones.

cont.entity_a: Works well when connected to dish receiver.
cont.entity_b: Useful for older systems without working sound cards. Compatible with Windows 10, Mac OSX 10.13, and Raspbian Jessie. Works well with iPod and car audio systems. Great replacement for broken laptop sound card. Easy to install on Windows and Ubuntu.

cont.entity_a: Effective for cleaning up old tapes and LPs transferred to MP3.
cont.entity_b: Sound enhancements can be easily turned off. Not portable due to power source limitation. Restores MP3 song sound quality.
Small, easy to set up and use.
